This gives you the comfort of knowing our products are brand new and come with the full manufacturer's warranty. Product FeaturesStylish Faux Leather Purses Girl's School Satchel Bag Gifts IdeasZipper closure51" shoulder dropMaterial: soft faux Leather, top handle and effective waterproofClosure: Magnet button and zipper switch. With detachable and adjustable strapsProduct Size: External size: L12.8 x W3.8 x H10 inches, Inner size: L12.2 x W2.7 x H9 inches and weight of 1.6 poundsInternal Structure: The main compartment space for spare iPad mini, charger, purse, note book and more. A zippered pocket on the outside rear of the bag that would hold a smart phone or a wallet. Two open pockets on one side and one zippered pocket on the opposite side can hold key, ID card, change and other small items Product DescriptionThe Ecosusi Vintage Messenger Purse Satchel is very attractive and could be used as a young girl's school bag or as a brief case for a woman. It is very attractive, well made of soft faux leather. The dimensions are L12.8 x W3.8 x H10 inches. The bag has a very nice (and expensive) look and feel. The interior lining is very stylish and appears that it will hold up very well. There is a zippered pocket on the outside rear of the bag that would hold a smart phone or a wallet. This compartment could be used to store items that you did not want to have to open the main compartment to get to. The main compartment is zippered closed. Once open you will find two open pockets on one side and one zippered pocket on the opposite side. Note:Please note that since this is pu leather bag it comes with a distinct smell which fades away after 1-2 weeks of regular use.Also the faux leather might feel a bit stiff in the starting but it loosens out with usage.Due to monitor variations & measurements, the color & size may appear slightly different.Due to the nature of the material and the way in which it was produced, this bag features a distinctive leather smell which quickly reduces with regular use. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Thank You for shopping with us!
